pullrequest.title: Move artifact origin to center of tunnel entrance

content.raw:
Does the relay node crash for you if the service is called past the entrance? 

```
[Err] [GameLogicPlugin.cc:711] [GameLogicPlugin]: Robot [X1] is too far from the staging area. Ignoring PoseFromArtifact request
[subt_ros_relay-3] process has died [pid 7798, exit code -11, cmd /home/developer/ws/install/lib/subt_ros/subt_ros_relay __name:=subt_ros_relay __log:=/home/developer/.ros/log/
ce45ce24-ae5a-11e9-862a-0242ac110002/subt_ros_relay-3.log].
```
